distri: Looking at the quantity of songs, analysis of Jazz music can be done from the second part of the 80's. It is interesting to notice that Jazz music is not very hot, indeed this type of music is known to be esteemed by a small part of the population contrary to Pop or Rock music which are more popular.
Hottness: Looking at intrumentalness seems to inlight the fact that Jazz music is more about instrument than textual songs. This probably also explained why Jazz music has a smaller public. It is also interesting to notice that accousticness of Jazz music has not changed a lot for the past 30 years in opposition to most of the other type of music.
